SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, process_id FROM elp_process WHERE process_id = :process_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT PROCESS_ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, to_Char(EFFECTIVE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EFFECTIVE, to_Char(EXPIRATION,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRATION FROM elp_Process ORDER BY Code, Expiration
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_process SET code = :code, description = :description, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE process_id = :process_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_process ( code, description, effective, expiration, created_by, process_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :process_id )
